column5: Need a store for mail order fishing gear/lures. I used to order from Lebanon’s.   What are the options.
In Canada try www.fishingtacklestore.ca new site but some interesting products on it!
I  have bought from these guys  https://www.thefishinhole.com/
Thank you. Sticker shock.  $20 a bass lure now.  Wow.
lol, stay the heck away from anything japanese then...Crappy rapalas are $15 and are basically junk.
https://fishingworld.ca/ https://www.cabelas.ca/ https://www.sail.ca/ http://www.anglerschoice.ca/ http://www.gagnonsports.com/fishing https://www.xzonelures.com/site/home

Fish and Save is great especially when they have a sale but watch out for the shipping. The amount of shipping can often be mitigated by looking at you products and eliminating heavy or bulky items form your cart. Ditch the coil of lead, and order more flys or cranks as they weigh less. By the way sometimes that site sells a dozen flys for $2.00 to $3.00 when they have a flyboy sale.
I ordered a Kistler rod from them this spring. Arrived within a few days and was properly packaged.  I would do business with them again.. I think they're outta BC...
Little late but ... Land Big Fish , out of Kentucky,  very reasonable shipping. Had the Bomber  Flat A I was searching for
